gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hawks 132, Hornets 91
gameRecap.excerpt: Atlanta defeats Charlotte, 132-91. For Atlanta, Dejounte Murray led the way with 28 points, seven rebounds, 12 assists, and five steals while Bruno Fernando finished with a career-high 25 points and six rebounds in the victory. Miles Bridges recorded 27 points and five rebounds while aided by Nick Richards (12 points, 16 rebounds) for Charlotte in the losing effort. Atlanta improves to 31-39, while Charlotte moves to 17-53 in the loss.
